thread.title: Obama Having a TOUGH Time in Retirement, Look What He Was Spotted Doing with Richard Branson…
thread.title_full: Obama Having a TOUGH Time in Retirement, Look What He Was Spotted Doing with Richard Branson…

author: Nickarama
title: Obama Having a TOUGH Time in Retirement, Look What He Was Spotted Doing with Richard Branson…
text:
04:48pm February 7, 2017 Do you like this article? 
Now that Barack Obama is no longer president, he is free to do what he likes best. 
After golfing, that is. 
What he seems to like best is vacationing in elite spots, like the Necker Island in the British Virgin Islands. 
Here he is, getting “high as a kite” with Sir. Richard Branson, who owns the island. 
He fell on his butt. A lot. 
Here they are with Branson playfully choking Obama. 
Here a shot of Necker Island. Vacationing here must be very hard… 
Media is waxing on his need for a good vacation after such hard work for eight years. 
Didn’t he spend half his time golfing or on vacation? 
But it is such a relief to see him now, knowing that when he fails or falls over now, it isn’t affecting policy, now that he is no longer President. LIKE this article? I hated this article. I'm a liberal.
